subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. SIF = 7BS-B-3-3111.1000; fPp = B/B/NBB, B/B/BBB; fCx = 1.1.1; fSt = 2.2; fSc: PL> AM> AL (rarely AL> AM); Ip = 862–1046; fD = 2H-(6–11)-(5–10)-(5–10)-(3–11)-…, typical variant 2H-8-6-6-4-6-2; DS = 29–48; VS = 27–47; NDV = 60–90. Standard measurements of specimens from Turkey are given in Table 16 .

caption.paragraph:
TABLE 16. Standard measurements of
Neotrombicula sympatrica
.

paragraph.tableNote: Note: For S n = 4, for V min and V max n = 0, for other variables n = 8.

subSubSection.paragraph: Type material deposition. Holotype and paratypes are deposited in ZISP.

Type material examined. Holotype (6510, T-Tr.-15) and 11 paratypes larvae ex
Apodemus ponticus
and
A. uralensis
, RUSSIA : Krasnodarskiy Krai, 5.5 km NW from Sadovoye, Malaya Sobachka river, 44° 25' 16" N , 39° 05' 51" E , 200 m a.s.l., forest (maple and hornbeam), 24 August 2000 , coll. AAS; 2 paratypes larvae (ZISP) ex
A. ponticus
, ibidem, 1.9 km SEE from Sadovoye, S from Chinary railway station, 44° 22' 47" N , 39° 11' 31" E , 175 m a.s.l., forest (hornbeam, alder, and maple), 26 August 2000 , coll. AAS; 1 paratype larva (ZISP) ex
Microtus daghestanicus
, ibidem, 3 km S from Goryachy Klyuch, near Dolina Ocharovaniya railway station, 44° 35' 36" N , 39° 05' 58" E , 135 m a.s.l., forest (oak, hornbeam, and maple), 23 August 2000 , coll. AAS; 20 paratypes larvae (ZISP) ex
Apodemus (Sylvaemus)
sp., ibidem, 0.5 km N from Anastasievka, 44° 10' 48" N , 39° 17' 12" E , 145 m a.s.l., hornbeam forest, 23 August 1994 , coll. AAS.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 31.
Neotrombicula sympatrica Stekolnikov, 2001
(material from the collection site 14, 1998). A , scutum and eyes; B , arrangement of dorsal idiosomal setae; C , arrangement of ventral idiosomal setae. Scale bars: 50 µm ( A ), 100 µm ( B, C ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material from
Turkey examined.
Four larvae (ZISP) ex
Apodemus flavicollis
, Çanakkale Prov. , 3.8 km SW from Ayvacik ,
340 m a.s.l.
,
12 October 1969
, coll. M. Daniel;
2 larvae (ZISP) ex
Apodemus (Sylvaemus)
sp., Rize Prov. , upper part of Çağlayan (Abu) valley ,
1000 m a.s.l.
,
28 June 1998
, coll. AAS
; 18 larvae (ZISP) ex
Microtus majori
and A. (Sylvaemus) sp., ibidem, 500 m a.s.l., 29 June 1998 , coll. AAS.

Hosts.
Chionomys gud (Satunin)
,
Ch. nivalis (Martins)
,
Microtus daghestanicus (Shidlovsky)
,
M. majori Thomas
,
Rattus turkestanicus (Satunin)
,
Alticola argentatus (Severtzov)
,
Apodemus agrarius (Pallas)
,
A. flavicollis (Melchior)
,
A. ponticus (Sviridenko)
,
A. uralensis (Pallas)
.
Distribution. Russia (Krasnodarskiy Krai, Dagestan , and Tyva Republic ), Armenia , Turkey , Kyrgyzstan .
